user_data.target_needs: I wanted a wallet that provided security for my personal information while being functional and stylish.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a wallet that not only offered good quality but also provided protection against identity theft. The RFID blocking feature was particularly appealing as it addressed my concerns about data security. Although I found it a bit bulky, the craftsmanship and functionality were key factors in my decision to purchase.

I needed a compact wallet that could fit comfortably in my front pocket while still holding my essential cards and cash. However, I found it to be larger than expected, which was disappointing. My decision was influenced by the practicality of the design and the material used, but ultimately, the size did not meet my needs.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer a good balance of comfort, quality, and functionality. I value items that are well-made, using strong and durable materials, and that provide a good fit. I appreciate versatility in products, such as clothing that can be used for various activities like swimming, running, or casual outings. Additionally, I tend to favor brands that offer good value for money and have a reputation for quality. On the other hand, I dislike poorly made items that do not meet my expectations in terms of quality and durability. I also find bulky designs unappealing, as I prefer items that are practical and easy to carry. Overall, I look for products that combine style, comfort, and functionality without compromising on quality.

conversation.content: I want a wallet that provides security for my personal information while being functional and stylish. within my expected price range: [6.99, 29.99]
What specific features are you looking for in terms of security for your personal information in a wallet?

I prefer a wallet with RFID blocking technology to protect my personal information from electronic theft. This feature is important to me as it adds a layer of security for my cards and identification.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <HAMMER ANVIL RFID Blocking Minimalist Front Pocket Wallet Genuine Leather> / Item ID: B072MPFCR8 / Price: $14.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Wallets Card Cases & Money Organizers', 'Wallets'] / Description: ['RFID Protected!Hammer Anvil\'s Anti-Breach Technology TM will stop anyone from obtaining your information. Wireless readers will not get through our RFID protection.Minimalist Slim Card Case Wallet By Hammer AnvilA simple wallet for everything you need without the back pain of carrying a big wallet. Great for carrying your money and business cards as well. Nothing says "professional" like a business card coming out of a nice leather card case! Product Features:Measures: 4" x 3 1/4" x 1/8"Genuine LeatherFeatures Hammer Anvil Anti-Breach Technology TM6 Card Slots Including 3 Card Slots on Each Side 1 Larger Card/Money/Receipt Pocket - Top Center AccessMSRP $65.00Simply Perfect!'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Timberland Men's Leather RFID Blocking Passcase Security Wallet> / Item ID: B081TWX2LR / Price: $19.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Wallets Card Cases & Money Organizers', 'Wallets'] / Description: ['TIMBERLAND LEATHER RFID WALLET WITH REMOVABLE PASSCASE', '- A functional compact wallet with lots of storage, 6 credit card pockets, 2 slip pockets, 2 cash bill pocket, a removable flip pocket and RFID Protection.', 'WHAT IS RFID?', 'RFID stands for Radio Frequency Identification Denoting, it is the use of radio waves to identify objects carrying encoded chips. This can include credit card information, passport identification or other forms of ID and access cards.', 'WHY SHOULD I BUY A RFID WALLET?', 'With credit cards and debit cards moving to RFID Chips, there is a growing concern of identify theft and electronic pickpocketing. Thieves are skimming and stealing credit card information from unexpected individuals. Now is the time to protect yourself and upgrade your wallet. Keep your information safe while still looking trendy.', 'EACH TIMBERLAND RFID WALLET FOR MEN INCLUDES', ': - 100% Genuine leather exterior  - 6 standard sized credit card pockets  - 2 slip pockets  - Removable Passcase wallet (features 2 ID Windows)  - A large horizontal cash pocket split into 2 pockets  - RFID blocking protection  - Size 4.25" x 3.5"', 'THE PERFECT MENS MONEY ORGANIZER:', 'With so much storage one might think this wallet would be bulky, but your wrong. We designed this mens wallet to be compact and thin so it will fit nicely in your front pocket or your back pocket. With the function of a large wallet and the benefits of a slim wallet our wallet is one of the best mens wallets available.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <LEVOGUE Genuine Leather Mens RFID Blocking Slim Trifold Wallet with 6 Cards+1 ID Window + 2 Note Compartments> / Item ID: B09XKN3FX4 / Price: $15.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Wallets Card Cases & Money Organizers', 'Wallets'] / Description: ['100% genuine hand-crafted leather imported from Italy, soft, comfortable and durable', "SLIM & STYLISH looking with soft hand feel, full grain leather is the best durable leather. Small, stylish and elegance, high quality genuine leather, the wallet is a best choice for Father's day gift.", 'Leathers are certified by LWG and lining by OEKOTEX', 'Protect Your Valuable Information With this RFID Blocking Wallet!  Since October 2015, all Credit Cards have RFID chips so you are exposed to data theft.  With the new identity theft, a RFID protective wallet is very necessary!  Equipped with advanced RFID Secure Technology, it can block RFID signals from cards work at a frequency of 13.56 MHz:  1. Credit cards;  2. Debit cards;  3. Identity cards;  4. Driving Licence.  It can NOT block RFID signals from cards work at a frequency of 125 KHz:  1. Older prox cards;  2. HID 125 khz;  3. Some building access cards.', 'Package Include:', '1 x Leather Wallet 1 x Gift BoxPerfect choice for Gifts.']
